kpi_info.title: IN_PREPAID_MO_SMS_FREE
kpi_info.use: An MO short message is being sent, but due to a CAP error situation or SCP refusal, the SCP does not control the sending of the SMS. This occurs when the default handling parameter in the SMS-CSI defines that in this kind of situation the sending of MO SMS can continue. For more information on CAMEL, see Feature SG01053: CAMEL phase 3 in SGSN.
